title: Liz Truss – 2022 Comments on Visit to India
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Liz Truss, the Foreign Secretary, on 31 March 2022.
content:
Deeper ties between Britain and India will boost security in the Indo-Pacific and globally, and create jobs and opportunities in both countries.
